text:
V. Vijay (18) and his brother V. Sanjay Kumar (14) of Azhagiyamanavalam died in an accident on Tiruchi–Salem main road near Manachanallur on Sunday. Police said that the brothers were riding a two-wheeler. When they entered the main road from the village road, a motorcycle hit their vehicle.

The brothers were thrown off their vehicle on the road. A lorry ran over them, killing them on the spot. — Special Correspondent
title: Brothers die in accident
